org.arl.fjage.shell

Class ConsoleShell

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.arl.fjage.shell.ConsoleShell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Shell

    public class ConsoleShell
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Shell
    Console shell with line editing. Use three ESC to abort running processes rather than ^C supported on the TcpShell.
